tripadvisor_subtitulo: Real experiences from adventurers like you
review_sarah: "An absolutely incredible experience. Jaguar Expeditions guides know the jungle like the back of their hand. We saw pink dolphins, sloths and an incredible variety of birds. I will definitely return!"
review_carlos: "The night tour was spectacular. Listening to the sounds of the jungle in the darkness and seeing the bright eyes of the caimans was an experience I will never forget. Very professional and safe guides."
review_ana: "The attention to detail and respect for nature of this team is admirable. We learned a lot about medicinal plants and local culture. An educational and exciting adventure."
review_michel: "Fantastic! The biodiversity we encountered was beyond imagination. Our guide spotted animals we never would have seen on our own. Jaguar Expeditions made our Amazon dream come true!"
ubicacion_subtitulo: We are located in the heart of the gateway to the Amazon
ubicacion_tiempo_taxi: 15 min by taxi from the airport
info_util_subtitulo: Everything you need to know before your Amazon adventure
info_clima_desc: Humid tropical, 26°C average. Dry season: May-October. Rainy season: November-April.
info_que_traer_desc: Light clothing, repellent, sunscreen, rain boots, waterproof camera, flashlight.
info_salud_desc: Yellow fever vaccine recommended. Basic medications included in our tours.
info_gastronomia_desc: Try juane, tacacho, grilled paiche and unique Amazonian fruits like camu camu.
info_fauna_desc: Pink dolphins, sloths, jaguars, macaws, over 500 bird species.
info_flora_desc: Over 3,000 plant species, giant trees, medicinal plants and exotic orchids.

faq_respuesta_vacunas_consulta: Consult with a travel medicine specialist 4-6 weeks before.
faq_respuesta_emergencia_botiquin: Complete first aid kit on every tour
faq_respuesta_emergencia_hospitales: Direct contact with hospitals in Iquitos

faq_respuesta_limite_equipaje_guardarrop: We offer free luggage storage service at our office.

nosotros_hero_subtitulo: 15 years connecting adventurers with the magic of the Peruvian Amazon
nosotros_historia_subtitulo: A journey that began with a passion for the Amazon
nosotros_historia_p1: It all began in 2010, when our founder, Carlos Ríos, a native guide from Iquitos with more than 20 years of experience in the jungle, decided to create something more than a simple tourism agency. His vision was to share the true essence of the Peruvian Amazon with travelers from around the world.
nosotros_historia_p2: Born and raised on the banks of the Amazon River, Carlos grew up learning the secrets of the jungle from his grandfather, a respected shaman in the community. This deep connection with nature and ancestral culture became the heart of Jaguar Expeditions.
nosotros_historia_p3: What began as small tours for foreign friends gradually transformed into an internationally recognized company. Today, 15 years later, we have guided more than 10,000 adventurers from 50 different countries, always maintaining our core values of respect, authenticity, and conservation.
nosotros_imagen_caption: Casa del Hierro, one of the first sites we began showing to our visitors
nosotros_vision_texto: To be the most respected and responsible Amazon tourism agency in Peru, recognized for offering authentic experiences that transform lives while protecting the jungle and supporting local communities.
nosotros_mision_texto: To connect travelers from around the world with the magic of the Peruvian Amazon through safe, educational, and sustainable adventures, promoting ecosystem conservation and the development of native communities.
nosotros_valor_respeto: Respect: For nature and ancestral cultures
nosotros_valor_seguridad: Safety: Total protection of our visitors
nosotros_valor_pasion: Passion: Genuine love for what we do
nosotros_equipo_subtitulo: Meet the experts who will make your adventure an unforgettable experience
nosotros_compromiso_texto: At Jaguar Expeditions we believe that tourism should be a positive force for change. That's why we have developed several programs that directly benefit local communities and contribute to Amazon conservation.
nosotros_equipo_habla_subtitulo: Learn about the motivations of those who make each adventure possible
testimonio_carlos: Every day in the jungle is unique. My greatest satisfaction is seeing the eyes of amazement of our visitors when they discover the magic of the Amazon for the first time. It's the same amazement I feel every day, even after 20 years.
testimonio_ana: Organizing each tour is like creating a symphony. Every detail must be in perfect harmony for our adventurers to live a transformative experience. Logistics is my passion.
testimonio_miguel: Sharing the ancestral knowledge of my people is an honor. Every plant, every animal has a story to tell. I get excited seeing how visitors connect with the wisdom of my ancestors.
nosotros_cta_titulo: Ready to Discover the True Amazon?
nosotros_cta_subtitulo: Join our family of adventurers and discover why we are more than a tourism agency
programa_educacion_desc: Educational program in rural schools about conservation and sustainable tourism. We have benefited more than 500 children.
programa_reforestacion_desc: For each tour, we plant a native tree. To date we have planted more than 15,000 trees in degraded areas.
programa_apoyo_desc: 20% of our profits are reinvested in community projects: health centers, drinking water systems and productive workshops.
desc_carlos: 20+ years of experience in the Amazon jungle. Specialist in flora, fauna and native cultures. Speaks Spanish, English and Shipibo.
desc_ana: Licensed in Tourism with specialization in ecotourism. She is in charge of planning and coordinating all our expeditions with precision and care.
desc_miguel: Native Shipibo guide with ancestral knowledge of medicinal plants. Expert in wildlife spotting and night navigation.
desc_rosa: Specialist in traditional and modern Amazon gastronomy. Creates unique culinary experiences using fresh local ingredients.
desc_roberto: 15 years navigating Amazon rivers. Professional nautical license and expert in water safety. Knows every corner of the rivers.
desc_elena: Trilingual (Spanish, English, Portuguese) specialized in personalized attention. She ensures that every visitor feels at home.

tour_expedicion_rio_amazonas_desc: Navigate the world's longest river and discover the magic of the tropical rainforest
tour_nado_con_delfines_rosados_desc: A unique experience swimming with the Amazon's pink dolphins
tour_safari_nocturno_amazonico_desc: Discover the nightlife of the jungle and observe caimans under the stars
tour_tour_gastronomico_desc: Discover the unique flavors of the Amazon and learn to cook typical dishes
tour_casa_de_hierro_historica_desc: Discover the history and colonial architecture of Iquitos in this iconic building
tour_medicina_ancestral_desc: Learn about Amazonian medicinal plants with local shamans
tour_navegacion_nocturna_desc: Navigate the Amazon under the stars and experience the nocturnal magic
tour_observacion_de_aves_desc: Specialized in spotting the 500+ species of Amazonian birds
tour_observacion_de_fauna_desc: Specialized in spotting unique animals of the Amazon

tour_trekking_selvatico_desc: Deep walk through virgin paths of the Amazon rainforest
